title: Good Design Good
imageCaption: CREATIVE DIRECTION / BRAND IDENTITY / UI / UX
description: A series of rebrands and redesigns illustrating how Good Design can do good.
richtext:
This collection includes an array of causes that deserve attention and action. The goal of these designs is to generate awareness, encourage involvement, and spark change in our communities.
National Alliance on Mental Illness ![National Alliance on Mental Illness](/images/nami_interface_ndenton.jpg "National Alliance on Mental Illness")

Alzheimer's Association ![Alzheimer's Association](/images/alzheimers_design_ndenton.jpg "Alzheimer's Association")

Black Lives Matter ![Black Lives Matter](/images/blm_interface_ndenton.jpg "Black Lives Matter")

350 ![350](/images/350_interface_ndenton.jpg "350")

World Animal Protection ![World Animal Protection](/images/wap_interface_ndenton.jpg "World Animal Protection")
